Floral association:
Lespedeza bicolor
( Fabaceae ),
Melilotus officinalis
( Fabaceae ),
Potentilla chinensis
( Rosaceae ), Asteraceae gen. et sp., Umbelliferae gen. et sp.,
Mentha arvensis var. piperascens
( Lamiaceae ).
General distribution: Russia , Japan , China (Beijing, Shanxi, Jiangxi, Heilongjiang, Jilin; Inner Mongolia ).
